data.actual_result: The text/typing cursor appears making it seem that you may highlight or edit the text channel name when in fact if you click it you drag the discord window around
data.expected_result: I believe when hovering over the channel name the cursor should appear as the default triangular cursor as if you click and hold you drag the discord window around
data.short_description: Text cursor to drag instead of highlight
data.steps_to_repro: - Hover over the current text channel name at the top of discord - Attempt to highlight channel name
